title: Doctor Syntax Bound to a Tree by Highwaymen
text: The accidental exposure of a man's bald head in public was considered the ultimate humiliation, a display almost sexual in nature similar to having one's pants pulled down. That Doctor Syntax is rescued by two countrywomen adds further comedy and disgrace to the scene.
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
